connect20/segmentify_recommendation_engi.name: connect20/Segmentify_Recommendation_Engine

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/segmentify_recommendation_engi.description: Segmentify for Magento is best conversion optimization application with product recommendation, personalization and real-time analytics capabilities. Segmentify's AI based engine automatically understands user behaviour on your online store and takes actions to increase your sales.
